title: dear rioters can you please explain why im banned for calling someone toxic
body:
ok so after being told to kill myself multiple times and spam pinged and reporting those players and they are still active I figured this was a little faulty but now I know you guys actually don't care about the lower ranked players.

so my last game on this account (00shots00) I was playing bard support and got first blooded after a fail cheese against thresh and I think jhin? don't know, this twitch started his toxic rampage, calling me a noob and losing his mind. as the game goes on he continues to blame others and calls us all noobs and trash and what not. so I just try to have a few quick words to him not being toxic just stating facts and trying to stop this twitch from making everyone want to lose. 

so basically this is what I say its not a copy and paste but its close enough.

normal shit talking at the start

this twitch is so toxic

because I don't want to die

we should report this twitch

you called 2 people noobs man

yeah well I'm reporting you

easy

ban


so with this twitch tilting my whole team and me being the support in chat and in game I successfully scare this twitch into playing sportsman like and he does, even changes the way he is talking to us, at the end of the game (we won) he asks if I reported him I say no because he turned out to be nice in the end and he laughs and says he reported me.

so I get 14 days of suspension for doing the right thing. and literally supporting in every way shape and form considering its my new position, like man you guys have this massive company with this one game and have a system that checks specific works and bans off that? or is it because I'm just a gold 1 player and you guys don't care about the opinions of us gold/plat or lower players because hey we're to low I guess. honestly I need to know why I would get banned for this because I have spent so much time and money on this game because I really enjoyed it until now and I don't feel like I want to play a game where you get banned over someone being toxic to you and you change their attitude for that game. like thanks man
